feature1.explanation: Both texts use a variety of punctuation marks such as commas, quotation marks, and parentheses.

feature2.explanation: Both texts exhibit a similar level of lexical sophistication and grammatical complexity.

feature3.explanation: Both texts demonstrate coherence in sentence structure and similar quantitative features in terms of sentence length and complexity.

feature4.explanation: Narrative styles and tone in both texts are consistent, reflecting a formal and informative tone.

feature5.explanation: No spelling or typographical errors were observed in either text.

overall.explanation: Considering the similarities in punctuation style, lexical and grammatical features, sentence structure, text and discourse features, and absence of spelling errors, the likelihood of the texts being written by the same author is moderately high.
